CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Show annotations overlaid on the map.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Force download of POIs
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Force download of POIs from web, even if cached.

EditTextPreference.android:summary: Your Freemap password - WARNING, stored in plain text on phone, at risk if your phone is stolen!

EditTextPreference.android:title: Track simplification distance
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Douglas-Peucker simplification distance in metres for GPS track, points within this distance of track are removed. Larger values = more simplification.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Auto-clear cache frequency
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Frequency to auto-clear the map data cache in days. Use 0 if you don't want to auto-clear the cache.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save annotations on the device
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Save annotations on the device for later upload, rather than uploading in-the-field
